MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G53 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Catrine Road and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:15pm due to an underground cable fault and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:18pm on Monday, 08 February 2021
